reference: [1] Almon, S. - The Distributed Lag Between Capital Appropriations and Expenditures - Econometrica, 1965, pp. 178-196.

[5] Hoerl, A. E., and R. W. Kennard - Ridge Regression: Biased Estimation for Non-orthogonal Problems - Technometrics, 1970, pp. 55-67.
[6] Holland, Paul W. - Weighted Ridge Regression - Combining Ridge and Robust Regression Methods - Working Paper No. 11, National Bureau of Economic Research, September 1973.
[7] Jorgenson, D. W. - Rational Distributed Lag Functions - Econornetrica, 1966, pp. 135-149.
[8] Koyck, L. M. - Distributed Lags and Investment Analysis, (North Holland Publishing Company, Amsterdam, 1954).
